Params: {2: 'What do you want to talk about this time?', 3: '5'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'Have you found a way to defeat me, or have you gotten used to this?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I think this is the last time we'll talk like this.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'You have learned enough about your enemy, and I have realized that you are my most worthy opponent.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: 'So we clearly have no reason to keep talking like this.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Watch out for the Ascendants if you don't want that to happen to your Gray Raven.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "...I see you've come to the same realization without my warning.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "After this, we'll watch each other, beware of each other, and use each other like we used to.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "I'll keep my promise and take you away from this boring place.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alpha', 3: "Unless you're only brave enough to talk to me alone on your comms?", 4: '1'}
